entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When compiling NativeAOT, is the deferred information stored in a PDB file with field pointers like in C++? #97346
    Future
  • JIT: Assert `varTypeUsesFloatReg(tree)` blocking libraries-jitstress #97345
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Get the managed size of a System.Type instance #97344
  • Update of libunwind to 1.8.0 has broken remote unwind #97343
    9.0.0
  • AOT compiler generates invalid assembler code for Mac Catalyst in .NET 9 #97342
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Create a System.TypedReference from a ref and a type handle #97341
  • [RISC-V] relocation truncated to fit: R_RISCV_JAL against symbol `ThrowExceptionHelper' #97337
  • Test failure: HandleRefTest.Validate_NoGC() #97334
  • FileSystemGlobbingMatcher produces wrong stems #97333
  • JsonDocument JsonSerializer.Deserialize does not match JsonDocument.Parse for null root elements #97323
    Future
  • JIT: Invalid loop unrolling with non-top-entered loops #97321
  • workload 'android' missing on .NET 8 Linux #97319
    8.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: TensorPrimitives.Dot with specified result type #97318
  • .NET 8 crash with "Fatal error. Failed to create RW mapping for RX memory" #97316
  • [Request] Clarification and info on COMPlus_EnableAlternateStackCheck #97308
  • Unable to Publish .NET7 & .NET8 windows Azure Function App in windows 2022 server #97302
  • System.Numerics.Tensor test failures on CoreCLR #97297
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests fails with assertion in mini-ppc.c on ppc64le #97296
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests cause long-running/hanging tests on Mono JIT (not interpreter) #97295
    9.0.0
  • Type preinitialization skips dataflow analysis #97286
    9.0.0
  • No way to avoid bounds checks when multiple spans are involved #97285
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [mono][debugger] To do list to implement iCorDebug on Mono #49239
    Future
  • `dotnet test` is not running tests for .NETFramework targets #94183
    9.0.0
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #90676
    Future
  • CI unable to find file copied from runtime-assets #97307
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294.cmd #86399
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294.cmd #88808
    9.0.0
  • Crossgen2 PDB generation regressed after a refactoring in .NET 8, rendering the output PDB invalid. #96917
    9.0.0
  • in C# Round 256.3665,3,MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero #97287
  • Text.Json Serialization Context and Reference Handler #97315
  • [API Proposal]: TextWriter.Aggregate #93623
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `ThrowIfEmpty(Guid)` method to ArgumentException #97279
  • [8.0] [OSX] Long Running Test: System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.RSAKeyFileTests.ReadEncryptedRsa16384 #95094
    Future
  • Potential deadlock in TypeDescriptor #97179
    9.0.0
  • XmlCompiledTransform.Load throws a System.PlatformNotSupportedException on iOS with .NET 8 #96920
  • Reenable sdk->runtime subscription for ApiCompat task #95022
    9.0.0
  • [mono] gc method not implemented #97281
  • TensorPrimitives.IndexOfXx methods sometimes return the wrong index in the face of equality #97190
  • [API Proposal]: Generic overloads of existing TensorPrimitives methods #94553
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix access to m_pDynamicStaticsInfo #97353
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Move a lock to protect m_pDynamicStaticsInfo #97352
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] `HybridGlobalization` correct `HashCode` ranges of skipped unicodes #97351
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Add implementations for MakePointerType(), MakeArrayType() for GenericTypeParameterBuilder #97350
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Call VariantInit to initialize variants #97349
    test-bug, area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • avoid some allocations during TLS handshake #97348
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Add a workaround for #97342. #97347
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [RISC-V] Test TotalOrderIeee754ComparerTests: Fix NFloat - NaN testcases for RISC-V #97340
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Bump branding to .NET 9.0 Preview 2 #97339
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • add supportf for Socket.DontFragment on macOS #97338
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, 9.0.0
  • Specify higher equality tolerance for ReciprocalEstimate tests #97332
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [browser] update owners #97329
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update lead owner of compression #97328
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Generalize `FlowGraphNaturalLoop::AnalyzeIteration` #97327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Add support for callee saved XMM registers on Windows x64. #97326
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Skip loop unrolling when the test is not a backedge #97325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] follow up after moving files #97324
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove some loop flags #97314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Speed up cmake configure checks on Mono Windows build. #97303
    area-Build-mono
  • Hash code tests cleanup #97299
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, test-enhancement
  • Update Guid.cs #97290
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use TensorPrimitives.ElementWiseSelect instead of ConditionalSelect in more places #97282
    area-System.Numerics

Merged

  • Bump branding to .NET 9.0 Preview 1 #97336
    area-Infrastructure
  • Don't copy runner to test output during regular builds #96826
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add more Arm64 special-casing to TensorPrimitives #97331
    area-System.Numerics
  • Don't assume first argument in build.ps1 is subset #97330
    area-Infrastructure
  • Clean up and consolidate HostModel tests. #97244
    test-enhancement, area-HostModel
  • [workloads] Switch ForceNet8Current default now that the baselines are up to date #97335
    area-Build-mono
  • NativeAot: Enable GC event tracing on standalone GC #97257
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][ws] fix server initiated full close #97320
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Move regex test to use RemoteExecutor #97317
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Disable msbuild terminal logger #97309
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add package readmes (continued) #92228
    area-Meta, help wanted, 9.0.0
  • Fix Type.GetHashCode for RuntimeTypes w/o MethodTable #97195
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Switch RuntimeProperties host test to pre-built test assets #97245
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Make SourceBuild.props work on Windows #97291
    needs-area-label
  • [browser] bump benchmarks to Net9 #97305
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add TextWriter.CreateBroadcasting #96732
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Avoid deadlocks in TypeDescriptor #97236
    area-System.ComponentModel, 9.0.0
  • Define installer-owned directories in dotnet-runtime RPM package #97183
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Disable failing System.Numerics.Tensors tests #97301
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Late cast expansion: castclass #97237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve temporary TensorPrimitives.Round a bit #97283
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix XML comment summary on TensorPrimitives.RootN #97284
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Don't disable crossgen in crossbuild verticals #97163
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Enable On Stack Replacement #96558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Remove old loop code #97232
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add lots more TensorPrimitives operations #97192
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation

Updated

  • Fix: OID's cache poisoning with random values #93661
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Linux/ARM bring-up (4/n) #97269
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove Compiler::fgConnectFallThrough and BBJ_COND fix-ups in loop phases #97191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_JD_4A` to `SVE_JN_3B` #97129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Parse CallConvSwift in CoreCLR/NativeAOT and block struct types #96707
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: initial support for reinforcement learning of CSE heuristic #96880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize lsra for MinOpts #96386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refresh Test #91833
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoiding loading and processing same cert file to improve cold start performance … #97267
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_ED_1A, IF_SVE_EE_1A, IF_SVE_EB_1A, IF_SVE_EC_1A #97238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/8.0][browser] BrowserWebSocket.ReceiveAsync after server initiated close #97002
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.3
  • [browser][mt] Run all tests #97270
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Skip non virtual generic methods in build_imt_slots #93349
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Enable mono runtime to handle SIGTERM like CoreCLR #82806 #82813
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • STJ: Use base getter as fallback solution #97280
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Reenable branch optimizations when running with llvm. #97189
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Move PendingTypeLoadTable from the ClassLoader object to a global structure #96653
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Unconditionally enable `EETypeNode.SupportsWritableData` #97278
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wip][browser] Refactor AssertFilesOnDisk function to check subset of files #97031
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] EventPipe: Don't clean up thread list on shutdown #97188
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Add Arm64 encoding for IF_SVE_BL_1A #97223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [RISC-V] Update TODOs for RiscV64 Machine and Architecture in Crossgen2 #97021
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable riscv64 R2R in installer #96941
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • [mono][llvm] Fix an llvm assertion. #97276
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Set FlagNetStandard1XDependencies=true and fix issues #96795
    needs-area-label
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Create directory for Binding Tools For Swift #97208
    area-Meta
  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition #97159
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert Array.CopySlow to managed #97202
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Late cast expansion: remove the null check if possible #97234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.x
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Sanitize Reg Entries in SerialPort.GetPortNames (Issue 93240) #93242
    community-contribution, needs-author-action, area-System.IO.Ports
  • [Mono]: Reduce Mono AOT cross compiler x64 memory footprint. #97096
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • JIT: Skip `BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET` in `BasicBlock::VisitEHSuccs` #97184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • React to new Package Validation change #94432
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize flips between 1 and 0 #95990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono]: Add "driver" support to Mono AOT cross compiler. #97226
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 120.0.6099.224, windows: 120.0.6099.225 #97256
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable tests and fix bugs #2307

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement most of globalization #2490
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement time zone handling #2491
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Don't use `mmap` in the frozen object manager and enable writeable data #2492
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet published containers adding ".git" to image source label #38176
  • Installing a tool that targets a framework not installed gives a non-actionable error message. #38172
  • Workload ID maui-android is not recognized #38171
  • GenAPI drops ref keyword when generating reference source for System.Memory/4.5.5 #38166

Closed

  • For workload feature bands, treat `-rtm` preview versions the same as the stabilized, non-preview versions #36500
    8.0.2xx
  • Reenable CanRunDsicoveryTool test after rc2 runtime codeflow from templating #36587
  • [Regression] APICompat / PackageValidation runs without a runtime graph #38013
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38178
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Preview 2 branding #38177
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplified the code according to #38123 comment #38163
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #38161
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #38127
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Treat rtm as stable Fixes #36500 #37160
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update CI #37984
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Define RuntimeIdentifierGraphPath in outer-build #38168
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change the hard code of System.Data.SqlClient package version #38123
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38140
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add filtering to SdkSupportedTargetPlatformVersion validation. Fixes #38016. #38017
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion "Discriminated Unions" #113
    Working Set
  • Open issue: relax requirement that type be enumerable to participate in collection expressions #7744
  • [Proposal]: Let ref structs implement interfaces and substitute into type parameters #7608

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update README.md #7861

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Imperfect IEnumerable<T> -> Span<T> collection expression conversion #71755
  • SemanticModel.GetOperation returns `null` for postfix-suppression #71753
  • IDE0290 (use primary constructor) code fixer produces invalid code #71749

Closed

  • Some services crash when interpolating strings using switch expressions #71754
  • "System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not find System.Private.CoreLib.dll" in Release-mode MAUI application #71600
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Restored the reverted XAML PR (Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170) #71758
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Let the formatter format the whitespaces when converting an ArrowClauseExpression to a ReturnStatement when applicable #71757
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Extract factory interface for AbstractSnippetCommandHandler #71752
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix issue with 'use primary constructor' when an assignment uses a suppression operator #71751
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Only parse a single document when freezing documents with related linked files #71750
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: Make postfix `for` and `forr` snippets available for types with `Length` or `Count` property #71748
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use ParamCollectionAttribute to mark params collections in metadata #71747
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections

Merged

  • Fix bootstrap log publish #71756
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Allow Razor to register Json converters for functional tests #71746
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Avoid visiting reachable local functions with default state #71679
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Fix intercepting an instance method with a generic extension method #71658
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Prefer converting to ReadOnlySpan for spread optimization when we do not need to write #71733
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Make syntax list types into a "collection builder" types #71646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update code to use collection expressions #71591
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make the Roslyn code index CI use the LSIF generator just produced #71736
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure we don't leak the request info if a request is cancelled #71737
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Temporary storage #71362
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement extension indexer access #69122
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Break Solution-checksums into a checksums for pure-state vs source-generator state #71396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Restore "Remove properties from DocumentSpan" #71687
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add logging to track down a double dispose #71738
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix SyntaxGenerator not generating event field modifiers correctly #71739
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix line endings of semantic snippets #71731
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use Regex source generator in compiler #71721
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Accessibility testing for the Blazor Web template #53540
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails, ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudUpdateProduct #53537
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plainTextSansFilter, plainTextSansFilter #53536
  • Blazor Router cannot load Page from Razor Class Library #53534
  • Not rendering full page #53527

Closed

  • Add Clear [Documentation] For [Blazor Auto Mode ] #53367
  • .NET8 routing with UrlEncode(url) in parameter does not work #53138
  • Blazor (Server) route does not match when complex characters are in the url #53262
  • Blazor NavigationManager redirect to NotFound if route parameter contains encoded / #52808
  • [blazor .net8] Will InteractiveAuto Component use Server mode when another Component in InteractiveServer mode? #52336
    Discussions
  • Building static resources #5459
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Scaffolding for Razor Components #6921
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Produce a standalone blazor-devserver tool #17528
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Duplicate @key values don't throw clear exception in if/else case #18314
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor: Bind-Value fails at runtime rather than at compile time if the bound property doesn't exist #20312
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Static Web Assets cache busting mechanism #31922
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Custom RouteView Render Is Called Twice in Blazor WASM #33282
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor wasm client fails to start when PublishTrimmed=true and built using 7.0.201 and above #47442
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Routing] Should we decode `2FA` into `/` before running constraints #53480
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot #53506
  • Blazar WebAssembly with ClientCertificateMode.RequireCertificate #53491
  • Blazor inline `RenderFragment` syntax does not handle `EventCallback`s Properly #32227
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Question][Blazorhybrid] How can i use Custom Elements in blazor Hybrid application? #53516
  • DisposeAsync is called too late on page change? #53511
  • <StaticWebAssetsEnabled>false</StaticWebAssetsEnabled> causes an error #53515
  • [CRITICAL BUG] [REGRESSION] Problem when variables have the same name with differnt casing in blazor/net8 #53520

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Avoid fetching new page content when only the hash changes #53542
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Fix navigation for anchor inside <svg> element #53541
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Introduce a read-only mode for data protection keyring consumers #53539
    area-dataprotection
  • [Blazor] Fixes encoded `/` on Blazor Router #53538
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Enable regex constraint on the Blazor router #53533
    area-blazor
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-alpha.1.24070.3 #53525
    area-infrastructure
  • Update build to use a local package cache from a submodule and build 'offline' #53524
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fixes encoded values on Blazor Router #53470
    area-blazor
  • Make SourceBuild.props work on Windows #53523
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • SignalR performance: track groups per connection, remove on disconnect #53486
    area-signalr
  • [release/8.0] Add ForgotPasswordRequest to STJ source generation context #52830
    Servicing-approved, area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Use cached ILogger instances to avoid repeated creation of these instances #53200
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `7c07a86` to `96cd50c` #53481
    area-infrastructure
  • Add explicit null checks on ObjectPool.Return rather than triggering random failures later on #52935
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • #52067 input number range type #52747
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-22
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • added an option to collect rundown events #4470

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reopen #11785: FlyoutPage.IsPresented=false throws InvalidOperationException: 'Can't change IsPresented when setting Default' (default or any other behavior that can have split type behavior) #20088
  • [Android] Benchmarks.Droid.ViewHandlerBenchmark.Entry allocated more memory #20086
  • Windows app installs on Wndows 10 but fails to install on Windows 11 as it keeps asking for .NET even after installation of .NET 8? #20084
  • Is "UseMauiCompatibility()" to port from Xamarin.iOS to MAUI fully functional? #20075
  • Appearing page event fired twice when performing PushAsync() inside of the Appearing event hander method #20071
  • [Android] Secondary ToolbarItem Icon Color not correct #20070
  • FlexLayout children inside a Grid overflow FlexLayout container #20064
  • CollectionView - SelectedItem visual state manager not working #20062
  • Microsoft.Maui.Resizetizer.After.targets" was not found error coming while building the .net MAUI windows targeted application. #20057
  • Font Attributes is not applied in editor on macOS and iOS #20054
    Backlog

Closed

  • [regression/8.0.3] TapGestureRecognizer not working with TableView #19348
    Backlog
  • Window not resizing from the Top #20061
    Backlog
  • MAUI .NET 6/7 Library not loaded: @rpath/liblua54.framework/Versions/A/liblua54 #20026
  • Add Support for KeyedServices #18992
    Backlog
  • Shell navigation bar flickering during refresh (animation transition) after the menu/flyout item selection #20035
  • Issue with Frame Layout Causing Child AbsoluteLayout Rendering Problems, replace Frame with Grid works #19880
  • [iOS] CollectionView multi-select pre-selected item VisualState error #13072
    Backlog
  • [iOS] CollectionView SelectedItem not working #13059
    Backlog
  • [iOS] CollectionView: Color for SelectedItem of CollectionView not set when SelectedItem is assigned in ViewModel #20030
  • MAUI - CollectionView Pre Select Item background color not change on windows #15666
  • Resizetizer doesn't allow having one-letter named images #19574
  • Deployment fails to arm64-v8a emulator #20053
  • [Nightly] Removed EnumerableExtensions break MAUI Xaml Hot Reload #20049
  • "System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not find System.Private.CoreLib.dll" in Release-mode MAUI application #19894
  • Setting main page from modal async page does nothing on Android #14697
  • Using font files does not work #14871
    Backlog
  • Swipe Gesture within a carousel view not being Recognized in Android #15535

PullRequests

Created

  • Hide FlyoutIcon when FlyoutBehavior set to disabled #20087
    community ✨
  • More IndexOf() optimization #20083
    community ✨
  • Reset the xaml in the Sandbox MainPage.xaml #20082
    area/docs 📓
  • [Windows] Adjust recycle check in ItemContentControl #20079
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #20077
  • [net8.0] Update versions for 8.0.200 #20074
  • iOS PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden - Implementation #20069
    community ✨
  • Add Obsolete tag for old IndexOf #20068
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest to 4.3.4 #20067
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Trimming] Fix trimming warnings related to image source service provider #20058
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Call RootViewChanged when setting ContentView to null #20052
  • Improve Clamp() performance #20051
    community ✨
  • Optimize converters for GridLength, ColumnDefinition, and RowDefinition #20048
    community ✨

Merged

  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #20073
  • Make sure we support keyed services in client apps #20014
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Enforce preference of braces for code blocks (IDE0011) in .editorconfig #20056
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Default to no item selected #20072
  • [tests] Move integration tests to use MauiDotNetTfm #20060
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Resizetizer Regex Fix #19600
    area/single project ☝️, community ✨
  • Revert "Remove unused functions (#20029)" #20050

Updated

  • Source Generator Performance Improvements #19990
    area/Xaml </>
  • Translucent and Transparent NavigationBar on iOS #19204
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, .NET 8 SR2
  • Add animated GIF support for Image #19411
    area/image :framed_picture:, stale
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    community ✨
  • Split the InputTransparency tests #19925
    area/testing
  • Fixes carouselview layout on iOS #20001
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Optimize GetVisualTreeElementsWindowsInternal #19984
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Optimize resetting gesture recognizers #19987
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • Rectify the scopes in the builder #19932
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Optimize Thickness and CornerRadius converters #20033
    community ✨
  • Add better exception for missing Maps on Windows #19046
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/Maps🗺
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, stale, area/gestures
  • [Trimming] Add a feature flag to disable XAML loading at runtime #19310
    area/publishing 🏁, stale
  • [WinUI] Add workaround for Connectivity check on Win10 #19261
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, area/desktop 🖥️, partner/cat 😻
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Avoid crash using RotateYTo and RotateXTo #18484

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow standalone set operations (and ValuesExpression) without a wrapping SelectExpression #32890
  • Is it ment to be that .Contains right now ignore string lenthg in linq ? #32889
  • Can't get CRUD scaffolding to work after running Reverse Engineer from EF Core Power Tools, get reflection error #32887
  • Cannot delete the db file after calling DbContext.Database methods - EF Core 7.0.11 #32882
  • EF Core 7 `System.ArgumentNullException: Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'second')` #32881
  • Error in use AddInterceptors with AddDbContextPool #32879

Closed

  • If `int` column is inherited from abstract class, it's always `nullable: false` #32866
  • Open up SelectExpression construction #31379
    9.0.0
  • EF Core 6 | ValueGeneratedOnAdd & UseIdentityColumn doesn't track the integer primary key properly. #32885
  • Possible memory leak when use PooledDbContextFactory #32652
    9.0.0
  • Same reference type instance shared by multiple entities is only saved to the last entity's JSON column #32799
  • InvalidOperationException with JSON columns and owned entities on update #32621
  • ExecuteDeleteAsync throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException when an owned entity is present and LINQ operators are composed #32823
    9.0.0
  • Do full null semantics analysis on the subquery's projection column in InExpression #32850
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Cleanup of TPC handling #32891
  • Rename CheckPropertyBelongsToType to CheckContains #32888
  • Use provider discriminator values for OfType() #32878

Merged

  • Extract SelectExpression construction out to RelationalQueryableMethodTranslatingEV #32877
  • Clear _modificationCommandGraph when returning the context to pool #32871
  • Handle complex types in GetDatabaseValues #32813
  • Stop using System.Transactions in MismatchedKeyTypesSqlServerTest #32886
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlcipher from 2.1.7-pre20231117161811 to 2.1.7 #32883
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.1.7-pre20231117161811 to 2.1.7 #32884
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fix SelectExpression cloning when client projections are present #32824
  • Bubble up nullability for IN+subquery in SqlNullabilityProcessor #32849

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Use the unpatched shared framework as the minimum requirement for tools. #32869
    Servicing-approved
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.Core issue with multiple Blob colums #32770
    waiting-for-response

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NETSDKE2E] On Debian11 only, SDK dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-alpha.1.24070.3.deb installing failed with error: archive 'aspnetcore-runtime/aspnetcore-targeting-pack-9.0.0-alpha.1.24068.16-x64.deb' uses unknown compression for member 'control.tar.zst' ling faile #18314

PullRequests

Created

  • Preview 2 Branding #18325
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #18324
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Run sdk pipeline 3 hours after dotnet-dotnet pipeline #18323

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #18317
  • Update to the January implicit versions #18296
  • Run sdk pipeline 3 hours after dotnet-dotnet pipeline #18321
  • Update SDK assembly exclusions #18311
  • Update source build prebuilts tarball version #18318
  • Use PAT to enable pulling code from non-dnceng AzDO orgs #18315
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Use PAT to enable pulling code from non-dnceng AzDO orgs #18316

Updated

  • Update to the January implicit versions #18295
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #18310
